---

Given Values:

```{r}
q_L <- -1.96
q_U <- 1.96
sd <- 1
mean <- 0

alpha <- 0.05

```


Find Probability:
```{r}
pnorm(q_L, mean, sd, lower.tail = TRUE, log.p = FALSE) #0.025

pnorm(q_L, mean, sd, lower.tail = FALSE, log.p = FALSE) #0.975

pnorm(q_U, mean, sd, lower.tail = TRUE, log.p = FALSE) #0.975

pnorm(q_U, mean, sd, lower.tail = FALSE, log.p = FALSE) #0.025



```



Find Critical Values:

```{r}

qnorm(alpha/2, mean, sd, lower.tail = TRUE, log.p = FALSE) #-1.96

qnorm(alpha/2, mean, sd, lower.tail = FALSE, log.p = FALSE) #1.96

qnorm(1 - alpha/2, mean, sd, lower.tail = TRUE, log.p = FALSE) #1.96

qnorm(1 - alpha/2, mean, sd, lower.tail = FALSE, log.p = FALSE) #-1.96


```
